Row.Label: Admins
Row.Description: Limited to a restricted set of site administrators with special access permissions to configure the website.

Row.Label: Curators
Row.Description: Limited to a small number of users whose job is to manage content on the website.

Row.Label: Harvesters
Row.Description: Limited to authorized automated processes that synch data between this website and other systems.

Row.Label: Users
Row.Description: Limited to people who have logged into website.

Row.Label: No Search
Row.Description: Open to the general public, but blocked to certain (but not all) search engines such as Google.

Row.Label: Public
Row.Description: Open to the general public and may be indexed by search engines.

Row.Label: Undefined
Row.Description: Cannot be accessed by any users.
